# Zensical Migration Issue Triage Template

Use this template to classify and route migration issues consistently.

## Issue metadata

- Date:
- Reporter:
- Environment:
- Related PR/run:
- Affected page/component:

## Triage classification

- Severity: low/medium/high/critical
- Priority: P3/P2/P1/P0
- Type: bug/docs/link/performance/workflow
- Scope: prototype/cutover/post-cutover

## Impact summary

- User impact:
- Technical impact:
- Estimated blast radius:

## Routing decision

- Owner:
- Target milestone:
- Immediate action:
- Rollback required: yes/no

## Verification plan

- Validation commands:
- Success criteria:
- Follow-up review date:
